title: [Large-Scale] Scaffolding Instructional Design to Develop Elementary Science Explanation Construction Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and experience in simple experimental observation
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance scientific explanation construction skills in asynchronous learning environments utilizing digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can write testable explanatory statements for scientific phenomena with over 80% accuracy.
Learners enhance their ability to structure scientific explanations through four progressive support stages: model presentation → questioning → checklist provision → independent performance.
Learners can submit systematic explanatory reports, including scientific terminology, in project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
